meanings.definition: The quality or state of being desirable.
meanings.sent1: Her desirabilities made her the most popular girl in school.
meanings.sent2: The store displayed various desirabilities in its window.
meanings.sent3: His desirabilities were so evident that even the pets adored him.
meanings.sent4: The desirabilities of the job shone like a beacon in the darkness of unemployment.
meanings.sent5: The desirabilities of the vacation package were too tempting to resist.

meanings.sent1: The desirabilities on the menu made it hard to choose just one dish.
meanings.sent2: She collected all the desirabilities she could find in antique shops.
meanings.sent3: The desirabilities at the bakery were disappearing faster than hotcakes.
meanings.sent4: The desirabilities in the treasure chest sparkled like precious gems.
meanings.sent5: The desirabilities of the new phone model were causing a frenzy among tech enthusiasts.
